02d17d873421287e: Dɛtabeesi "$1" e la bombabannaa. A pɛllɛ ŋa na baŋ bare la dɛtabeesi yoŋ a pampana vɛɛseŋ ko a sɔtwaɛ ŋa. Dɛtabeesi tonnee la: $2.
093ba1a1eec787d7: Fo boɔrɔ ka fo seevi daata mine pamente emmo zie, kyɛ a sɔroo na a saseɛ miri naŋ sɔre paale la kooken mine naŋ ba tu. Leɛ loodi a paagyi kyɛ la enyɛ. Fo naŋ boɔrɔ ka fo meele a fo kɔɔkyiri.
110b0c5394900023: A sɛɛva ŋa be la pampana kanne-yoŋ moodi. Toŋ ne -- fere ka zo-pare a moodi.
148aa57832032b98: A tontona leɛre la aŋa "$1" kyɛ fo derɛ la yuori kaŋa "$2" ka fooŋ naŋ nyɛ a gampɛle ŋa see ka fo sage kyɛ maale boma mine biŋ gu. Kpɛ a tontoŋ yiri poɔ ka o e a yel dɛŋdɛŋ soba. A tontoŋ bone na koŋ baŋ e yel zaa ka fo baŋ ne a.
197b4e64419ef963:
A tontona teɔrɔ ka fo derɔ la $1, kyɛ areko neɛ soba sage la ka fo dirɔ la $2.

A e LW yɛlɛ naŋ na baŋ wanne yɛlɛ.
218be0dfc4b62b9d: A sɛɛva ŋa be la kanne-yoŋ moodi
21b07dc5f958c9a7: A sɛɛva be la kanne-yoŋ moodi (daamo meŋɛ).
22e9d098c2d1efba: Sɛre ka fo na toŋ ne stɔɔragye tage o do,aseŋ ka fo de a wɛb niŋe ka o sigi ane tɔge bonzaa naŋ kyɛnɛ (fo na baŋ ŋmaa la a kpaambo ŋa ne $1).
250ddde898b9609a: Sori ba kyebee a naŋ sage a toma ''SITAATU NEƐ'' sɔroo ka sage a sɛɛva ka o kaara laafeɛ.
25eee349d7bf6976: Ka fooŋ wa maala $1, a ɛrɔɔ sere maŋ eŋ la a sikyiima wulluu zie ta sage neŋ a sikyiima a fo koodi maŋ soŋ mɛ la.
2af01db370dc1e2c: Maale a '$1' a fo leɛroo poɔ!
2b35e7d9fb60fbfb: Paale a zie ŋa ne yɛlɛ. Yel-fere eebo naŋ kyaare ne a yɛlɛ maaloŋ ane yɛlɛ maaloŋ
2f8ae1342ed316d7: A sɛɛva ŋa ba konfigere a naŋ toŋ lammo sɔroo. Maale sɔroo. bammo ziiri' a konfigerese a yelpeɛle lammo soobo kyɛ baŋ de tere a sɔroo naŋ tona neŋ lammo sage deɛbo gbɛbogiri.
322d2b2c7a9d474e: Bomepɔgere ba bagenaa pare maŋ tere  la 'eebo'-$1
33c4f085bf9299d8:
Daata koŋ toɔŋ gaa ɛzaal bonso a PHPExcel laabere ba innitɔɔle. A saseɔ miri ŋa boɔrɔ la ka maale ɛzaal yineŋ GitHub
:

> https://github.com/PHPOffice/PHPExcel

Ŋmaa lɛ:

  - pɔge a leɛ bimmo a sɛɛva zie kaŋa
    (Like `/path/to/example/PHPExcel`).
  - zɛge PHP `$1` sɛtere (a `php.ini`) a paale a PHPExcel
    `klaasi` kyaaroo (teseŋ `/path/to/example/PHPExcel/Classes`).
3cce78264dc4036c: A sammo ama mine yi la asɛɛse guubu yɛlɛ. A daana fo naŋ tɔnnɔ neŋ ba taa sori a naŋ nyɛ a daatabaase kyɛ bee a taabole a saseɛ miri ŋa naŋ tɔnɔ neŋ. A seŋ ka fo tere sori ko a daana vuo, bee tonne daana kaŋa.
40ddd2ba684738d0: A sɛɛva e la konfigere neŋ daata masa yɔgaa, kyɛ masa ''$1'' bɔrɛɛ '' patisiri''konfigere piiŋ a manne wuli boɔbo patisiri.
48ace68f51009fe4: Soore Karendie ("$1") ba leɛ tere a ɔbgyɛt parɛɛ toraa yi "newResultObject()" (ŋmaara la "PhabricatorLiskDAO", karendebile naŋ be "$2"). Leɛ a ɔbgyɛte ŋmaaraa paree tere (a ŋaa porɛɛ la), bee empliment yelbegere "loadpage()" sobi-bulo (aŋaa ba tu mɔɔdiŋ koodi poɔ).
4c7e4ff89799ce75: Ka fooŋ ba maala a $1 meŋɛ, de a yɛlɛ ko a maale maalba.
660a8c185119e5e8: Yelzu yizie ŋmaaroŋ "$1" ba banne a.
6ae10f662edda8fc: $1 leɛre la a waaloŋ ko $2 yineŋ $3 te tɔ $4.
6d954f16c289224d: Ba toɔŋ maale a sʋgere moodi gyɔɔnoo( a apulikase daatabaasi ''$1'') bonso a sɛɛva ŋa be la moodi yoŋ. Lɛ zaa fo boɔrɔ ka fo e ba tɔnnɔ soŋ a kannoo yoŋ moodi.
7eb8465f2368634a:
Fo taa la MySQL vɛɛseŋ koroo (naŋ kore gaŋ 5.5) naŋ ba teɛ a utf8mb4 waaloŋ sɛte. Te na yeli ka zɛge o do eŋ 5.5 bee bompaalaa.

Ka foŋ paale adgyɛsement pampana kyɛ zɛge MySQL do eŋ 5.5 a puoriŋ bee bompaalaa, a na seŋ ka fo la paale adgyɛsement la maale (lɛ na a na di la wagere yaga).

Fo na baŋ bare la lɛ a toma ŋa naŋ kyɛnɛ, zɛge MySQL do pampana, kyɛ la leɛ e a toma ŋa la maale. Ŋa la a kaairuu, kyɛ na baŋ wane puori leɛbo pampana ŋa zaa.

Fo na baŋ bare la lɛ a toma ŋa naŋ kyɛnɛ, can exit this workflow, kyoge tona ne a sɔtwaɛ ŋa ka fo ba paale adgyɛsement, zɛge MySQL do a baaroo puori, kyɛ pãã e a toma ŋa la maale. Ŋa meŋ e la da-soŋ, o na vɛŋ la ka fo di wagere te ta a puoriŋ.

Fo na baŋ gɛrɛ la niŋe ne a toma kyɛmbo ŋa, kyɛ pãã e meŋɛ zɛge duobo MySQL a puoriŋ. Ka foŋ wa e, a na seŋ ka fo paale adgyɛsement la maale.

Ka foŋ wa boɔrɔ yɛlɛ yaga, nyɛ "Managyiŋ stɔɔragye adgyɛsemet" a sɛgere poɔ.
88e2d3daf79a6b62: A sɛva ŋa e la kannoo yoŋ waaloŋ (koŋ baŋ pɔge Masa).
9720b7711ba32d95: Boɔraa ka fo kaa fo meŋɛ gu bonne a biŋ o "$1" faŋa. Anaŋ na faŋa yɛlɛ ba kyɛ kyɛ.
9cbc3422f903a915: A vaarable $1 de la naŋ ba teɛre pare: $2. Sɔroo po a staki bɔgere ka a e yel-eŋ a kɔ-nɔzu $3 poɔ
ab1a64e7f6f9c4d5: Data koŋ baŋ yi a yelbie daga poɔ bonso a "zip" PHP tag-gaa tooro ba eŋ sere. Kpɛ kaa a gampɛle poɔ nyɛ ka o naŋ ba Leɛre soŋ see ka fo bɔ sommo.
aba1e8ccaa7f03ea: Yineŋ a yel-paala weoŋ a database dump poɔ. A gɔɔwuloo ŋa taa la tɔna ko a maaloŋ.
af706e68739d3978: Databaasi ''$1'' la wulli gaŋ yine. Wuli databaasi boyenaa yoŋ.
b4e44e40dfb8e1d8: $1 boɔle fo la ka fo wa paale $2.
b6b4a0803685c3e2: A savisi ŋa konfigere la a lammo moodi aneŋ a bammo sɔroo da nyɛɛ la yineŋ ("$1") ba wɔɛ-liisi a e lammo bammo.
bdb080aadeb94491: Bare tabul yoŋ a yoe dɛtabeesi eŋɛ (bee dɛtabeesiri, ka a eeboŋ la leɛ e) wuli dɛtabeesi yoe ka vo-ŋmaara kyebe (ana la: de "tɛɛtɛɛloŋ", ka a ta e "wuoro_tɛɛtɛɛloŋ").
c11cefba15ea7da5: Fo taa la sikyiima guure("tabol kpaaraa bee kɔlɔm a saseɛ miri naŋ kyɛlle o soŋ). A yi yɛlɛ kyaare neŋ leɛmaaloo a yɛlɛ, nyɛ a ''guubo sikyiima'' lamgiri naŋ be a managyi sitorogyi yɔllɔɔ'' atikili a dokumetere.
cdc0df63d2f99976: A toma leɛrɛɛ na baŋ toŋ ne feroo kaŋa kyɛ $1 ba wuli a yɛlɛ e zie. A webserver leɛrɛɛ see ka a de gaa $2 te ta PHP be la a software naŋ baŋ zagre la bone zaa naŋ na kpɛ o poɔ.
d7861fab5a6a779e: A sɛɛva be la kilasita moodi, aneŋ databaasi gyamaa taabo. Toŋ ne ''--taabo'' a Wulli a taabo fo naŋ boɔrɔ ka fo toŋ ne.
e80c009d94a33569: Fo saŋɛɛ la fo zaa ka fo sereŋ boɔrɔ ka fo saŋe a sitoregyi a $1 daata o taabo ''$2''? A yuobo koŋ toɔŋ bare ka fo daata meŋ koŋ nyɛ nyaabo ka fooŋ gɛrɛ nimitɔɔre.
ebf0f0c994f6a7db: A sɛɛva be la kanne-yoŋ moodi (daatabaasi sɛgere zaa ba e kofigere).
feeaf50c5ec762c8: A ɛrɔɔ ama mine yi la sikyiima kpaare(taabol mine bee kɔlɔm a saseɛ miri ŋa naŋ ba boɔrɔ). Ama ba e nimizeɛ. Yɛlɛ kyaare neŋ a maaloo, nyɛ a '' kpaabo sikiima'' zie a '' managyin bimmo zɛgebo'' atikili dokumetere.
